scripts.pretest: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n versor -o dist/versor.js -- src/versor.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" dist/versor.js -c negate_iife=false -m -o dist/versor.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j dist/versor.zip -- LICENSE.txt README.md dist/versor.js dist/versor.min.js
